content: a crochet baby washcloth in 100% cotton yarn is soft and gentle on baby s delicate skin make a stack of these pretty baby washcloths and add a bar of handmade soap for the perfect new baby gift the pattern is made using a light dk weight cotton yarn and a 4mm hook you can also choose an aran weight or worsted weight cotton yarn and a 5mm crochet hook for a dishcloth/washcloth finished size of washcloth is 9in x 9in 23cm x 23cm
